query: UPDATE products SET variants = JSON_REPLACE(variants, '$[0].price', 100) WHERE slug IN ('calzone-calwer', 'calzone-super', 'vegetarische-calzone', 'calzone-italia-mozzarella') AND JSON_EXTRACT(variants, '$[0].name') = 'mit Knoblauch';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22Rpum9L9sZxinw.3c3b08241dc8 --database co5PUNqXK8tudZyuUEyQHS --execute UPDATE products SET variants = JSON_REPLACE(variants, '$[0].price', 100) WHERE slug IN ('calzone-calwer', 'calzone-super', 'vegetarische-calzone', 'calzone-italia-mozzarella') AND JSON_EXTRACT(variants, '$[0].name') = 'mit Knoblauch';
